channel.title: pytorch - Tag - The Art of Artificial Intelligence
channel.description: pytorch - Tag - The Art of Artificial Intelligence

item.title: Fast Fourier Transform with PyTorch
item.author: Author
item.description: Recently Google released a model similar to Transformer but with self-attention replaced by Fourier transform. The model is just a bit less accurate but 6x faster on GPU. It is a great chance to introduce yourself to Fourier Transform with PyTorch.

item.title: Language Models [03] - Tokenizer
item.author: Author
item.description: Build the first component: a custom tokenizer

item.title: Language Models [02] - EDA
item.author: Author
item.description: Perform exploratory data analysis and create a project template for lanugage model.

item.title: Language Models [01] - Intro and theory
item.author: Author
item.description: Language models are the most important concept in NLP. Learn theory and implement one by yourself.
